oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Wally Fowler audition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Wally Fowler audition recording featuring the Turner Brothers, the Georgia Clodhoppers, and the Oak Ridge Quartet; including musicians Wally Fowler (vocals), Zeb Turner (steel guitar, slide whistle), Zeke Turner (electric guitar), Red Bennett (accordion), Joe Carroll (fiddle), Curley Kinsey (vocals), and Johnny New (vocals).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wally Fowler; Turner Brothers; Georgia Clodhoppers; Oak Ridge Quartet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Wally Fowler) -- Guitar Reel (Turner Brothers, Georgia Clodhoppers) -- Wally Fowler talks -- Just Thirteen Steps Away (Wally Fowler, Georgia Clodhoppers) -- Wally Fowler introduces Red Bennett -- Here Comes The Navy (Red Bennett accordion) -- Wally Fowler introduces the Oak Ridge Quartet -- You Must Have That Pure Religion (Oak Ridge Quartet) -- Wally Fowler introduces Johnny New -- Mama Don't Allow (Johnny New vocals) -- Closing statement (Wally Fowler) -- Closing theme (Red Wing)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fowler, Wally; Turner, Zeb, 1915-1978; Turner, Zeke; Turner Brothers; Georgia Clodhoppers (Musical group); Bennett, Red (Musician); Carroll, Joe (Fiddler); Kinsey, Curley; New, Johnny; Oak Ridge Quartet
